description.lang: 86-101 Plug in Dimmer Module Works with any AC operated lamps with incandescent and dimmable florescent(CFL) or LED light bulbs ON/OFF status and location LED indicator Can be controlled wirelessly or manually Plug and play, simple setup Lightweight and compact.Grounded 3-pin AC power plug to enhance safetyOver-The-Air firmware upgrade available with compatible gateway, Z-Wave static controller, PC and software Z-Wave 500 Series module inside Internal resettable fuse to protect from surge current Manual reset capability Adjustable dimming rate
Indicates the time duration of each level.
Indicates the time duration of each level.
LED indicator will be ON/OFF when connected to appliance depending on the configuration value.
LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is ON, and the LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is OFF
the LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is ON, and the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is OFF
the LED indicator is always OFF regardless of the load condition
The time interval of brightness change between dimmingup and down can be adjusted
Indicates the number of levels the lighting will change when the timer runs out.
